item.description: Amazing picture, I am totally speechless.

item.title: Comment on Tamil Nadu, India by Sarah Duff
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description: Thanks Hannah! I felt so bad for this elephant though - he was chained up and didn't look too happy. Seeing elephants being treated badly in India broke my heart.
item.content:encoded: Thanks Hannah! I felt so bad for this elephant though – he was chained up and didn’t look too happy. Seeing elephants being treated badly in India broke my heart.

item.title: Comment on Kerala, India by Sarah Duff
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff

item.title: Comment on Gorilla tracking, Volcanoes National Park, Rwanda by Sarah Duff
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description: Hi Marko, thanks for your comment! Gorilla tracking in Rwanda was the best wildlife experience of my life. It was indescribably magical. I'm definitely going to have to do it again - one hour with the gorillas just wasn't enough!
item.content:encoded:
Hi Marko, thanks for your comment!
Gorilla tracking in Rwanda was the best wildlife experience of my life. It was indescribably magical. I’m definitely going to have to do it again – one hour with the gorillas just wasn’t enough!

item.title: Comment on Gorilla tracking, Volcanoes National Park, Rwanda by Marko @ Travel Photo Blogging
item.dc:creator: Marko @ Travel Photo Blogging
item.description: People who have done it say seeing gorillas in their natural environment is a life-changing experience. How did you find it? Great capture BTW!
item.content:encoded:
People who have done it say seeing gorillas in their natural environment is a life-changing experience. How did you find it?
Great capture BTW!
